name: 3rd Person Combat and Movement
description:
Just a prototype of a 3rd person game, mostly just the movement / combat.

Keyboard and Mouse:
LMB - Attack
RMB - Defend
Shift - Dodge
Space - Jump
Tab - Lock-on to enemy

Controller:
West button - Attack
North button - Defend
Right bumper - Dodge
South button - Jump
R3 (Push in right stick) - Lock-on to enemy
